description:
★92% polyester 8% spandex,lightweight, stretchy,soft,providing you superior comfort without sacrificing mobility.
★Your casual wardrobe could use a little pick-me-up with this vibrant color tee. Comfy and relaxed fit with crew neckline and short-sleeve design.
★Quick-dry athletic shirts with superior air permeability, offering dry and cool feeling during exercise,thereby effectively wicking moisture away from your skin and helping to keep you comfortable all day and throughout your workout.
★Designed for an athletic comfortable experience. Crew-neck provides a nonrestrictive fit; short-sleeve allows for a wider range of motion. this lightweight training shirt is great to wear during any activity, and is a must-have for your athletic wardrobe, like fitness, running, cycling, soccer, all purpose style of it is good for matching any kinds of pants.
★This classic tee features just a little extra style,add a pop of color to your summer fit

Cotton Linen Material - The men's casual Henley shirt are made of soft cotton fabric, comfortable and lightweight, moisture-wicking and breathable, make you cool all the time.
Classic Design - With collarless neckline with four buttons closure, relaxed fit, solid color and long sleeves, this men's casual beach henley shirt is classic and stylish, never outdated and easy to match your clothing.
Suitable Occasions - The men's lightweight popover henley tops can be worn for plenty of occasions, perfect for casual wearing in daily life, work, beach, yoga, party, date, lounge or just hang out.
Clothing Match - These regular fit shirts could be easy to match with dress pants, slacks, chinos, and jeans, creating you casual style and attractive looking in the crowd.
Warm Tips - Machine washable and hand washing are both available for lightweight henley tee. Please check your size with our SIZE CHART before you buy it.
title: COOFANDY Mens Cotton Linen Henley Shirt Casual
